detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
happythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
name: Audit Name
identification_details: Have alternatives been considered and documented?
vital_signs: Has the patient been confirmed using two identifications?
surgery: Are the clinical reasons for insertion specified, communicated to the patient/bystander, and documented?
complaints_communicated: Has the need, possible complications, potential outcomes, and procedure been explained, and has the patient/bystander's informed consent been obtained by the performing doctor?
intake: Have the person performing the procedure and their assistants performed hand hygiene?
output: Is the person performing the procedure wearing PPE?
allergies: Is the person performing the procedure using sterile gloves?
diagnostic: Has the insertion site been prepared with chlorhexidine/alcohol, and has hand hygiene been re-performed?
lab_results: Has the site been properly positioned and draped?
pending_investigation: Was local anesthesia or sedation used?
medicine_order: Was aseptic technique maintained throughout the insertion, and was hand hygiene re-performed?
facility_communicated: Is it ensured that lumens are not cut?
risk_assessment: Has blood been aspirated from each lumen, and is the site cleaned?
urethral: Has the site been checked and cleaned with chlorhexidine?
urine_sample: Has sterile dressing been applied, and has hand hygiene been re-performed?
bystander: Has the placement been verified by X-Ray?
follow: Has the patient/bystander been educated regarding central line care and the frequency of follow-ups, and has the procedure been documented?
